comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: Heavyweight boxer Dan Daily was born in Williamsport, Pennsylvania, in 1887. His professional boxing career lasted from 1911 to 1922, though only three of his 28 bouts took place after 1914. At 6'6" (1.98 meters), he was one of the tallest boxers ever to enter the ring. BoxRec bout list.
